title: Curral dos Romeiros
body: Location in the parish of Monte, where the road leading to Choupana passes. Above the bridge of Curral, in Ribeira de João Gomes, there is a small but beautiful waterfall, which can be reached by following the levada that passes by the same bridge. Curral dos Romeiros is a place much visited by nationals and foreigners and is located at the bottom of a large valley, where pleasant impressions are gathered.
